src:
Setelah Raih Juara Umum II Festival di Bali, Tim Taekwondo Bandung Inten Kini Hadapi UIN Championship
01 Nov 2019, 08:57 by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


Setelah Raih Juara Umum II Festival di Bali, Tim Taekwondo Bandung Inten Kini Hadapi UIN Championship

KBRN, Bandung: Hanya beberapa hari rehat usai mengikuti Taekwondo Internasional Championship 2019 di Badung Bali 25 hingga 27 Oktober 2019, Tim Taekwondo Bandung Inten (TBI) kini bersiap hadapi kejuaraan UIN Taekwondo Championship III yang berlangsung Jumat (1/11/2019).Saat ditemui disela latihan, Sabeum Sapto Suprapto mengatakan, TBI Kota Bandung terjunkan 56 atlet di semua kelas yang dipertandingkan.“Untuk UIN kita menurunkan 56 atlet untuk semua kelas, pemula dan prestasi,”ungkapnya di Gor Derwati Kota Bandung, Kamis (31/10/2019) malam.Ia menambahkan,  TBI dengan atlitnya di bawah binaan Pengcab TI Kota Bandung ini,  sebagian besar berlaga dikelas Pemula.“Untuk Bali, kami latihan digenjot 2 setengah bulan, itu juga setelah kejuaraan MTC Open II, Alhamdullilah kita  Juara Umum I Prestasi dan kejuaraan Pandawa 2019 Juara Umum 2. Bali, sebelumnya kita tidak pasang target, tapi Alhamdullilah Juara Umum 2 Festival dapat kita raih. Berkat perjuangan atlet dan suport orang tua atlit serta semuanya yang terlibat. Mudah-mudahan di UIN Championship hari ini, kita bisa,”bebernya.Mengenai kejuaraan Internasioal di Bali yang diikuti ribuan peserta dari 8 negara, Sabeum Prapto Suprapto memuji teknik “Kekinian” yang ditampilkan peserta dari luar negeri. Menurutnya, TBI Kota Bandung sedikit demi sedikit, juga menyesuaikan teknik kekinian kepada para atlitnya.“Atlet luar bagus tekniknya menyeluruh, teknik dan stylenya kekinian. TBI sudah mulai menyesuaikan teknik baru untuk kompetisi. Persaingan ketat di Bali, kekuatan semuanya seimbang,”jelasnya.Dalam kejuaraan di Bali, Taekwondo Internasional Championship 2019, TBI kota Bandung meraih Juara Umum II Festival dengan raihan medali, 27 emas, 7 Perak. Selain itu juga di kelas Pemula TBI mendulang 2 emas dan 2 perak. Di kelas Prestasi 1 emas, 3 perak dan 3 perunggu.Ditempat yang sama Sabeum Arya Gifari yang merupakan coach TBI Puskopad mengatakan, meski 6 atlit asuhannya berdomisili di Kab. Sumedang, namun mereka berada dibawah binaan Pengcab TI Kota Bandung. TBI Puskopad menginduk ke Pengcab Kota Bandung.“Mereka (atlet) berada di bawah binaan Pengcab Kota Bandung. Ke Bali kami membawa bendera Kota Bandung, juga untuk UIN Championship III ini. Karena TBI Puskopad menginduk ke TBI Kota Bandung,”jelasnya.Pada kesempatan yang sama, Arya juga memohon maaf adanya miskomunikasi yang akhirnya membuat keberatan beberapa pihak.“Kemarin ada informasi yang tidak begitu baik, sehingga ada beberapa pihak yang merasa keberatan. Ada sedikit miskomunikasi,”imbuhnya.
text:
After Winning General Champion II Festival in Bali, Bandung Inten Taekwondo Team Now Faces UIN Championship
Nov 01 2019, 08:57 by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


After Winning General Champion II Festival in Bali, Bandung Inten Taekwondo Team Now Faces UIN Championship

KBRN, Bandung: Just a few days of rest after attending the 2019 International Taekwondo Championship in Badung Bali 25 to 27 October 2019, the Bandung Inten Taekwondo Team (TBI) is now preparing for the UIN Taekwondo Championship III championship which takes place on Friday (11/01/2019). When met during the training session, Sabeum Sapto Suprapto said, TBI in Bandung took 56 athletes in all competing classes. "For UIN, we reduced 56 athletes for all classes, beginners and achievements," he said at Gor Derwati in Bandung, Thursday (10/31/10) 2019) Malam.Ha added, TBI with its athletes under the guidance of IT Bandung City Pengcab, most of them competed in the Beginner class. "For Bali, we trained for 2 and a half months, that was also after the MTC Open II championship, Alhamdullilah we were the First Champion in Achievement. and the 2019 Pandavas General Champion 2. Bali, previously we did not set a target, but Alhamdullilah Champion 2 Festival we can achieve. Thanks to the struggle of athletes and parents support athletes and all involved. Hopefully at UIN Championship today, we can, "he explained. Regarding the international championship in Bali which was joined by thousands of participants from 8 countries, Sabeum Prapto Suprapto praised the" Current "technique displayed by participants from abroad. According to him, Bandung City TBI gradually, also adapts the current technique to its athletes. "Outside athletes have good overall techniques, present techniques and styles. TBI has begun to adapt new techniques for competition. Competition is tight in Bali, strengths are all balanced, "he explained. In the championship in Bali, the 2019 Taekwondo International Championship, TBI in Bandung won the General Champion II Festival with medals, 27 gold, 7 silver. In addition, in the Beginner class, TBI gained 2 gold and 2 silver. In the Achievement class 1 gold, 3 silver and 3 bronze. In the same place Sabeum Arya Gifari who is a TBI Puskopad coach said, even though 6 athletes of his care were domiciled in Kab. Sumedang, but they are under the auspices of the Bandung City IT Officer. TBI Puskopad has its roots in the Bandung City Pengcab. "They (athletes) are under the supervision of the Bandung City Pengcab. To Bali we brought the City of Bandung flag, also for this UIN Championship III. Because TBI Puskopad is a mainstay of TBI in Bandung City, "he explained. On the same occasion, Arya also apologized for the miscommunication that finally made objections to several parties." Yesterday there was not very good information, so there were some who objected. There is a little miscommunication, "he added.
